text: Gawlik is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Christoph Gawlik (born 1987), German ice hockey player *Ginter Gawlik (1930-2005), Polish soccer player *Krzysztof Gawlik (born 1965), Polish serial killer *Stanisław Gawlik (1925–1990), Polish actor *Weronika Gawlik (born 1986), Polish handball player *Zbigniew Gawlik (born 1956), Polish handball player ==See also== *Meanings of minor planet names: 22001–23000#527
title: Gawlik
